articles.title: Google will connect PCs, phones and Chromebooks with new synergy features - ARNnet
articles.description: At CES 2022, Google describes a number of ways in which it will use Fast Pair and other technologies to connect PCs, Chromebooks, Android phones and even cars and smartwatches.

Google's resolution for 2022 appears to be connecting
Chromebooks, Android phones and PCs together for improved synergy
and productivity.
